document.full_text: bp  is not expected to attempt a buyout of its oligarch partners in its russian venture tnk-bp  anytime soon, if at all, banking and industry sources said.
document.title: bp buyout of tnk-bp partners seen unlikely for now
lines_and_colors: bp  is not expected to attempt a buyout of its oligarch partners in its russian venture tnk-bp  anytime soon, if at all, banking and industry sources said.
